item.title: I regret not doing so
item.description: To not miss a post like this, sign up for my newsletter to learn computational biology and bioinformatics. My regret is not learning linear algebra well during college. I barely passed the exam for it (and calculus, it was a nightmare :) ). To be fair.. It was not taught well and it sounded too boring. I did not know what the application of matrix multiplication was, not untilâ€¦ Many years later, I started to learn bioinformatics.
